title: Wind Cave National Park: Work With Us
body: Work With Us        Employment Visit  http://www.usajobs.gov for information on federal employment.   Seasonal Employment  Information about seasonal work with the National Park Service.   Volunteers in Park (VIP) Program Information about the VIP Program at Wind Cave National Park.   Student Internships in Interpretation Information about Student Internships at Wind Cave National Park.   Student Conservation Association Resource Assistants work side by side with professional park staff and are expected to perform their assignments to the same standards as, and in cooperation with, paid seasonal park staff.
